pages.text: $(li)The Forest is simple biome with a good variety of different kind of trees.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find mainly Birch trees and Oak trees.

$(li)Some animals like Deers, Crows, Raccoons and Wolfs can be found walking around here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
